page.title: 08RECREATION/EVENTS
page.content: {The 'Hamefarin'}lasted for a week but a lot of people stayed longer. { { The boating Club Regatta}has boat trips, hot dog stands and the Virkie Majorettes.A Daft Raft Race is held at Grutness.People dress up and race over 1km.There will also be helicopter displays and the Virkie Majorettes. There is one playing field in our area near the village of Toab. The kind of hobbies people do are bird watching in the hills,sailing, canoeing,horse riding,etc.Plus the usual watching of television and listening to the radio.Recently photography has become very popular.
